file_content.text: You win--you win! Never wanted to fight you anyway.
Just... pay me what the Sith promised for the relics, and they're yours!
You're lucky to be alive. Don't push it.
You just tried to kill me.
But you're a Jedi! I thought you people had integrity.
If I didn't have to be someplace important, I'd haul you off to Republic security. Consider yourself lucky.
I could put you in prison.
You win.
My integrity is the only thing keeping you alive. Get out of here. Now.
Be thankful I don't kill you.
Yeah... yeah, all right. We're good.
Last time I do business with you people....
It's a deal.
And my old crew won't even need their share. Guess I'll need a new one, though....
Pleasure doing business, Jedi. See you around.
You crossed the wrong Jedi today.
No. [Kill him]
These Jedi relics are remarkably well preserved, Captain. Quite worth your ridiculous asking price.
Except they're not yours to purchase. Step away from them.
What is this, Captain? A trick?
You're the only person I told about it. I swear.
I heard about your deal from an Imperial spy named Watcher One. Hand over the artifacts.
That's the truth.
See? The problem's on your end.
Darth Angral will hear of this betrayal. But first things first.
My master is generous. Help me kill this Jedi, and he'll double your fee.
Double? Sorry, Jedi. A job's a job.
You can't win. Surrender is your only option.
[Force Persuade] Die for me.
I... I cannot defeat you. I must submit, or die.
Wait a second. What's going on?
Give me your weapons. You'll be treated fairly.
My weapons are yours. I am your prisoner.
Uhh... you can have the relics--free of charge. Men... run away!
Can't believe you just did that... but I'm not arguing. Wouldn't dream of it.
Executing Sith = right thing to do? // T7 = confused
You said I could have those artifacts if I killed the Sith.
[Lie] We had a deal, Captain.
That's a lie! I've never met this Jedi!
Unless you pirates want to share your captain's fate, help me kill this Jedi.
You will not deny Darth Angral his prize.
Make any trouble, and you won't be walking out of here. Guaranteed.
I'm not here to talk. [Attack]
